mapper.select: select * from scheduling pb inner join staff yg on pb.s_id=yg.s_id where date_format(pb.rq,'%Y/%m/%d')=#{rq} and yg.ks_id=#{ksId}
select * from scheduling pb inner join staff yg on pb.s_id=yg.s_id where date_format(pb.rq,'%Y/%m/%d')=#{rq} and pb.fr_id=#{frId} and ks.ks_id=#{ksId}
select * from scheduling pb inner join staff yg on pb.s_id=yg.s_id where date_format(pb.rq,'%Y/%m/%d')=#{rq} and yg.ks_id=#{ksId} and yg.s_id=#{sId}

SELECT staff.s_id, staff.s_name, staff.s_sore, staff.s_phone, staff.s_date, staff.u_id, staff.ks_id, staff.t_id, staff.s_zt, frequency.F_id, frequency.F_start_time, frequency.F_end_time, frequency.fc_id, department_ks.ks_name, department_ks.ks_dz, department_ks.de_id, title.T_name, scheduling.Sc_id, scheduling.rq FROM staff INNER JOIN title ON staff.t_id = title.T_id INNER JOIN department_ks ON staff.ks_id = department_ks.ks_id INNER JOIN scheduling ON staff.s_id = scheduling.S_id INNER JOIN frequency ON frequency.F_id = scheduling.fr_id where DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(scheduling.rq,'%Y-%m-%d') and time(frequency.F_start_time) < time(NOW()) and time(frequency.F_end_time) > TIME(NOW())

select * from scheduling pb inner join frequency fr on fr.f_id = pb.fr_id inner join staff yg on pb.s_id=yg.s_id inner join title ti on yg.t_id=ti.T_id inner join register gi on gi.t_id = ti.T_id inner join department_ks sk on sk.ks_id = yg.ks_id WHERE 1=1
and yg.s_name = #{text} and TO_DAYS(NOW())-TO_DAYS(rq) > -7 and TO_DAYS(rq) >= TO_DAYS(NOW())
and pb.rq = date_format(#{dates}, '%Y-%c-%d' )
and TO_DAYS(NOW())-TO_DAYS(rq) > -7 and TO_DAYS(rq) >= TO_DAYS(NOW())
and time(fr.F_end_time) > TIME(now())
and sk.ks_id = #{ksId}
and sk.de_id =2 ORDER BY fr.f_end_time

SELECT * FROM scheduling s WHERE s.rq=#{rq} and s.s_id in
#{i}
